Description: Fragment of papyrus bearing 13 lines of Coptic, written along the fibres (recto). Contains an account of various articles, including clothing, sent by a man to his brother, Kyriakos.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (381268) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/381268)
Ede 1972- / Writing and lettering in antiquity (1992, no. 39.)
